text: Werner Schneyder (25 January 1937 â€“ 2 March 2019) was an Austrian cabaret performer, journalist, writer, actor, stage director, television presenter and sports reporter. He performed cabaret in duo with Dieter Hildebrandt from 1974 to 1982. He presented Das aktuelle Sportstudio of the ZDF from 1975, and a series about boxing for RTL from 1992 to 1992. Schneyder was found dead at his home in Vienna on 2 March 2019, aged 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Interview Category:1937 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Actors from Vienna Category:Singers from Vienna Category:Writers from Vienna
title: Werner Schneyder
